summary: Changes Maiq the Liar into Todd Howard, CEO of Bethesda, So you can hear all the lies straight from the horses mouth.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes M'aiq into Todd Howard, the man to thank for Skyrim.
Why would I do this?
Because M'aiq is the embodiment of all of the sins of Todd Howard. Now instead of a furry animal person tellng you everything wrong with the game, it's the man himself.
No DLC required.
100% lore friendly.
You will regret not being this close to Todd.
Bask in his glory, his beauty.
Todd is love.
Todd is life.
[youtube]B7trmEmI5Js[/youtube]
[youtube]rcjpags7JT8[/youtube]
(Note: I didn't make these videos but I find them quite relevant)
author: grasscid
